title: Best of the Program | Guest: Daniel Horowitz | 1/11/22
description:
Glenn Beck’s newest book, “The Great Reset,” is out now. Glenn explains why his new book is vital for every American to read. Glenn surveys all the different fact-checkers that exist. Blaze podcast host Daniel Horowitz of "Conservative Review" joins to share how Twitter banned him after he reported about a vaccinated hospitalization.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
